name: Steampunk Demolition Derby
description:
To win, simply outlast your opponents in an arena filled with obstacles and oil geysers and where the diabolical Arena Master will not allow contestants to slow down or stop. The Arena Master will also call out various arena "enhancements" from time to time to make things harder for all contestants. 

Avoid walls and crates, which will damage you and launch you into the air. Avoid oil slicks, which can cause you to lose control. Once you are out of control, it is very difficult to get it back!

This was written for the GMTK (Game Maker's Toolkit) 2-day Game Jam in July, 2020. The theme of the jam was "Out of Control."

--- Credits ---
